skillRows.description:
ELF has two normal attack methods:
Normal Attack 1: Stabs rapidly to deal 2100% ATK of Physical DMG.
Normal Attack 2: Thrusts to deal 2100% ATK of Physical DMG.
After entering the battle, ELF restores 0.85 SP per second.
ATK Interval: 3.3s
ELF's Basic ATK hit additionally restores 5.0 SP for the ELF; CD: 2s.
ELF's Basic ATK hit has a 40.0% chance to deal 60.0% ATK of Physical DMG; CD: 6s.
ELF's Basic ATK hit boosts ELF's Physical DMG by 30.0% for 10s. Can be refreshed.

Gather enemies and deals 280%x8 ATK of AOE Physical DMG. After the attack, gather the enemies again and cause an explosion to deal 1000% of Physical DMG. Ultimate inflicts [Dissociation] on enemies hit for 5s and each stack causes them to take 1.0% more Physical DMG. Max stacks: 5. Casting Ultimate reduces character switch CD by 8s.
CD: 45s
SP: 75
After using Ultimate, ELF's critical rate increases by 90.0% for 20.0s.
ELF's Ultimate deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG.
When switching characters, increases Total DMG of all characters by 2.0% for 8.0s. Max stacks: 2
[Team-triggered] Increases Physical DMG by 5.0% of all characters when the team leader is a Physical DMG dealer.
[Team-triggered] With one or more Physical DMG dealers on the team, increases [Dissociation]'s effect of each stack to 2.0%.
